languages.text: "Мое истовое желание выжечь изнутри пару сотен ксеносов на пути отсюда оказалось сильнее смерти".
"My fervent desire to boil a few hundred xenos in their own skin on my way out of here proved stronger than death."
languages.original_text: "Мое истовое желание выжечь изнутри пару сотен ксеносов на пути отсюда оказалось сильнее смерти".

traits.locale_text: "My fervent desire to boil a few hundred xenos in their own skin on my way out of here proved stronger than death."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "My fervent desire to boil a few hundred xenos in their own skin on my way out of here proved stronger than death."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "My fervent desire to boil a few hundred xenos in their own skin on my way out of here proved stronger than death."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "My fervent desire to boil a few hundred xenos in their own skin on my way out of here proved stronger than death."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “我当时在想，等我从这里出去之后，我要把几百只异形都烤得外焦里酥。事实证明，这样的渴望比死亡更有吸引力。”
languages.original_text: "My fervent desire to boil a few hundred xenos in their own skin on my way out of here proved stronger than death."

traits.locale_text: “我当时在想，等我从这里出去之后，我要把几百只异形都烤得外焦里酥。事实证明，这样的渴望比死亡更有吸引力。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Je me suis accroché à l'idée d'ébouillanter vivants quelques centaines de xénos sur le chemin de la sortie. »
languages.original_text: "My fervent desire to boil a few hundred xenos in their own skin on my way out of here proved stronger than death."

traits.locale_text: « Je me suis accroché à l'idée d'ébouillanter vivants quelques centaines de xénos sur le chemin de la sortie. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Mis fervientes deseos de hervir a unos cuantos cientos de xenos mientras buscamos la salida de este lugar resultaron ser más fuertes que la muerte».
languages.original_text: "My fervent desire to boil a few hundred xenos in their own skin on my way out of here proved stronger than death."

traits.locale_text: «Mis fervientes deseos de hervir a unos cuantos cientos de xenos mientras buscamos la salida de este lugar resultaron ser más fuertes que la muerte».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「俺がここを出るときに感じた2、300匹の異種族への熱い怒りが、死に勝ったということだ」
languages.original_text: "My fervent desire to boil a few hundred xenos in their own skin on my way out of here proved stronger than death."

traits.locale_text: 「俺がここを出るときに感じた2、300匹の異種族への熱い怒りが、死に勝ったということだ」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Mein fieberhaftes Verlangen, auf dem Weg nach draußen ein paar hundert Xenos in ihrer eigenen Haut zu kochen, hat sich als stärker denn der Tod erwiesen."
languages.original_text: "My fervent desire to boil a few hundred xenos in their own skin on my way out of here proved stronger than death."

traits.locale_text: "Mein fieberhaftes Verlangen, auf dem Weg nach draußen ein paar hundert Xenos in ihrer eigenen Haut zu kochen, hat sich als stärker denn der Tod erwiesen."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "My fervent desire to boil a few hundred xenos in their own skin on my way out of here proved stronger than death."

languages.text: "Buradan çıkarken birkaç yüz zenoyu canlı canlı kaynatmaya dair duyduğum yoğun istek, ölümden güçlü çıktı."
languages.original_text: "My fervent desire to boil a few hundred xenos in their own skin on my way out of here proved stronger than death."

traits.locale_text: "Buradan çıkarken birkaç yüz zenoyu canlı canlı kaynatmaya dair yoğun isteğim, ölümden güçlü çıktı."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
